consent_id.description: Stable identifier for this consent artefact.

principal_id.description: Identifier for the principal granting consent.

recipient_id.description: Identifier of the party (or narrowly defined class) allowed to rely on this consent.

recipient_type.description: Optional type hint (organisation, verifier, service, class).

purpose.description: Machine-readable purpose declaration. Purpose is a constraint.

scope.description: Permitted disclosures or proofs. Intentionally minimal at spec-first stage.

duration.description: Temporal bounds. Short-lived consent is preferred by default.

constraints.description: Optional constraints (one-time use, context binding, frequency limits). Left open to preserve flexibility.

revocation_ref.description: Pointer or mechanism enabling verifiers to check revocation or expiry state.

proof.description: Optional proof material (signatures, attestations). Intentionally unspecified at spec-first stage.
